Reviews.Title: A  necessary add-on to a unreliable Smart Start system
Reviews.Author: James O'Donnell
Reviews.Content: I had a cs3000 smart start system installed on my car a while back. I found the smart phone feature unreliable. Wouldn't work all the time. The system didn't come with a remote/fob. Directed wanted $100.00 for this. Amazon had it for under $40.00. Much happier with system now.

Reviews.Title: A must have because your cell phone wont start the car all the time
Reviews.Author: Terry A Sharp
Reviews.Content: I had to buy this because the smart start doesn't work 25% of the time. I will never buy a smart start remote starter again.

ProductInfo.Features:
Optional Remote for Ps3000, Vss3000 & Cs3000
Includes Universal Rf Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Directed Audio Essentials 9474T Opt Remote For Ps3000
